messages.message:
When you create a field and make a custom validation, then change the name of the field, the field gets removed from the custom function.

However, if you add several fields to the validation, and change the name of those fields, it updates the custom function.
https://www.loom.com/share/4358a1e5f26e4aeeb58972c484c608c6?sid=834216da-f62e-486c-bc30-4c4dcf706602
we made a fix for this in 24.08, which hopefully is deployed to prod soon! https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/53319
